Wistia Blog

01 Nov 2013

Built the company blog using Ruby on Rails and Elasticsearch. I worked with one designer through the development process and the project took 3 months start to finish.

  • Wrote a Wordpress importer in Ruby
  • Built a Rackspace server for the blog
  • Managed server and support after launch
